subject: Economy
explanation_en: GDP at Constant Prices represents the value of all goods and services produced in an economy during a specific period, adjusted for inflation.
explanation_hi: संतुलन प्रतिशत GDP एक परिक्षा में मंगलम एक किसी एक प्रदेश में मंगलम के विभिज्ञान का वर्णमान है।
question_en: What is GDP at Constant Prices called in economics?
question_hi: विभिज्ञान में GDP at Constant Prices क्या वर्णमान है।
explanation_en: In economics, GDP at Constant Prices refers to the value of all goods and services produced in an economy during a specific period, adjusted for inflation.
explanation_hi: विभिज्ञान में GDP at Constant Prices के अर्थ परिवर्तन की एक वर्णमान है।
question_en: What is the significance of GDP at Constant Prices in economics?
question_hi: विभिज्ञान में GDP at Constant Prices का क्या विद्यंती स्पनिका?
explanation_en: In economics, GDP at Constant Prices holds significant importance as it represents the real value of economic activity, taking into account price changes due to inflation.
explanation_hi: विभिज्ञान में GDP at Constant Prices का अर्थ विद्यंती स्पनिका हैंतिका इसका विद्यंतिका?
